website_summaries.verdict: Number one way to get rid of creepy crawlies like ants, spiders, and roaches.
pros: Reviewers rave about how well it works on bugs that crawl
Works great in small rooms,  like crawlspaces, that bugs love to hide in
cons: Be sure to air out rooms after use
Not intended for insects with wings, but may kill them too

customer_reviews.title: I am glad that I waited to write this review
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that I waited to write this review. At first I was ticked that this didn't work but a month later I see NO critters and plan to purchase and use again just to be sure that they are ALL goners!
customer_reviews.author: Kim'me

customer_reviews.title: Killed a black widow 10x16 shed
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have done a good job I’m very pleased with the results as we found a dead black widow and we all know how hard they are to kill. We plan on buying quarterly just as a maintenance plan. We are in Phoenix Az. I used in a 10x16 shed I’d recommend
customer_reviews.author: Golden

customer_reviews.title: Kills and Repeals!
customer_reviews.text: When you set these off, you feel like Jefferson (the Great Jim Brown) in the Dirty Dozen! Set up you locations first, then pull the triggers and get out of the house for a few hours. When you come home, vacuum up the carnage! Follow the directions. These bad boys work well
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Vassallo

customer_reviews.title: I have a strong aversion to spiders. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a strong aversion to spiders. I have not seen even one for 6 months after I used these foggers in my hobby room. Hurray!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ONLY 2 CANS- not "packs"
customer_reviews.text: The product says "2 pack" don't make my mistake and assume it means 2-3packs. And of course the item is Non returnable
customer_reviews.author: M. Sal

customer_reviews.title: Had not used this for sometime, It's not as ...
customer_reviews.text: Had not used this for sometime, It's not as strong as older versions, Because of this it did a minial job in exterminating the roach infestation.
customer_reviews.author: maritta

customer_reviews.title: It don't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work on any bugs i still have fleas in my home and i have a small home . Will never buy again
customer_reviews.author: Eric s.

customer_reviews.title: Great for out buildings!  Easier then spraying!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen a live bug since starting to use these a year ago in the "old barn"
customer_reviews.author: SaRAoRAH

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bombed out house and specifically our bedroom but within 2 weeks started getting bitten again so what ever the bug these bombs didn't kill it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Daniel Esler

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for fleas. It didn't kill them all.
customer_reviews.author: Mama of 4

customer_reviews.title: Breeding pheromone?
customer_reviews.text: I must have ordered the wrong thing. I think that instead of poison to kill, mine emits some type of breeding pheromone. Granted the problem that I had in my shop was horrendous, I mean I have NEVER seen a flea problem like this before; but sorry to say, this fogger DID NOT WORK!! I have now set off 3 times to suggested amount, on three separate occasions, and the problem is only marginally better. Very disappointed and wondering what to do now?
customer_reviews.author: C. Labiche

customer_reviews.title: Not good for Bed Bugs
customer_reviews.text: Did not kill the kinds of bugs we had hoped it would, and we even used multiple ones. I do not recommend this product for people desperately looking for a solution to bed bug problems.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent barrier reinforcer
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. After a couple of rounds these reinforced the barrier well.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Bugs don't live here anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to kill every bug in sight about three months since I bombed. I had an ant problem in one of my rooms. I gave up on the ant liquid traps as they would come back in a few weeks time! Gave the fogger a shot and was impressed with the results so far! I have not seen any bugs in months even small spiders. I would recommend more time airing out the room or rooms your are bombing. This stuff is strong and can cause throat and nose irritation.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. from Va

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: didnt worket for me also way less at a large retailer
customer_reviews.author: B. Greider

customer_reviews.title: unable to return
customer_reviews.text: There's No option to return quoting dangerous item. Make sure that you are absolutely sure you will use all before making purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Peng
